showScoreExcerpt:
"Unlike Betty’s madcap star vehicle, 'Smash' doesn’t move with verve or purpose."

Read more
dtliExcerpt: The concept gives way to more than one cringy moment when it’s obvious that “Smash” itself, directed here by Susan Stroman, is in trouble. True to the spirit of its source material, and leveraging Monroe as little more than a totem, the show stalls out delivering misguided fan service in flat sitcom rhythms.
